original: dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa /
translated: There were also countless bodhisattva mahāsattvas, all of whom had attained dhāraṇī,

original: ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa /
translated: had attained samādhi,

original: stong pa nyid kyis rnam @3a *//🔽par spyod pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis rnam @3a *// par spyod pa /
translated: had practiced emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can /
translated: had the sphere of activity of signlessness,🔽and

original: rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa /
translated: They had aspirations free of concepts.

original: chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa /
translated: They had attained the acceptance that all phenomena are the same.

original: chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa /
translated: They had attained the dhāraṇī of nonattachment.

original: thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa /
translated: They had unimpeded eloquence.

original: bstan pa zad mi shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa /
analyzed: bstan pa zad mi shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa /
translated: They had realized the way of the correct discrimination of the inexhaustible teachings.

original: mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba /
translated: They were playing with the great superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa /
translated: Their superknowledges were unimpaired.

original: mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa /
translated: They had words worthy of being heard.

original: le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa /
analyzed: le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa /
translated: They were diligent and had begun their efforts.

original: lus dang srog la mi lta ba /🔽tshul 'chos pa med pa /
analyzed: lus dang srog la mi lta ba / tshul 'chos pa med pa /
translated: They did not care about their bodies or lives.🔽They were not hypocritical.

original: kha gsag med pa /
analyzed: kha gsag med pa /
translated: They were not flattering.

original: grags pa dang / khe dang / bkur sti'i sems med pa /
analyzed: grags pa dang / khe dang / bkur sti'i sems med pa /
translated: They had no thoughts of fame, gain, or honor.

original: zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa /
analyzed: zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa /
translated: They taught the Dharma without material desires.

original: chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par @3b khong du chud pa /
analyzed: chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par @3b khong du chud pa /
translated: They had realized the sublime acceptance of the profound Dharma.

original: mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa /
translated: They had attained great fearlessness.

original: yid yongs su zhum pa med pa /
analyzed: yid yongs su zhum pa med pa /
translated: They had no mental lassitude.

original: bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa /🔽las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa /
analyzed: bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa / las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa /
translated: He had transcended all the works of Māra.🔽He had cut the continuum of karmic obscurations.

original: las dang nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa /
analyzed: las dang nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa /
translated: He had conquered karma, afflictions, and opponents.

original: pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa /
analyzed: pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa /
translated: He was unassailable by any opponent.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: He was difficult for all śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas to fathom.

original: chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa /
analyzed: chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa /
translated: He was skilled in teaching and analyzing the Dharma through his realization of the Dharma. He had made aspirations for countless eons.🔽He had a smiling face.

original: bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa; sngon du smra ba /
analyzed: bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa; sngon du smra ba /
translated: He spoke first.

original: khro gnyer med pa /
analyzed: khro gnyer med pa /
translated: He was free of frowns.

original: snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa /
analyzed: snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa /
translated: He had a pleasant and gentle voice.

original: pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa /🔽spobs pa mi chod pa /
analyzed: pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa / spobs pa mi chod pa /
translated: He was skilled in speaking in verse and song to others.🔽He had uninterrupted eloquence.

original: 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the fearlessness that overawes infinite retinues.

original: bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung ba la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in the wisdom that arises from teaching for limitless millions of eons.

original: chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa; sems yongs su zhum pa med pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa; sems yongs su zhum pa med pa /
translated: They had realized that all phenomena are like illusions, mirages, reflections of the moon in water, dreams, echoes, optical illusions, space, cities of gandharvas, emanations, and reflections.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in understanding the mind streams, subtle knowledge, conduct, and interests of all beings.

original: @4a *// sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: @4a *// sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: They had a mind that was free of hostility toward any being.

original: bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa /
translated: They had great patience.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in the wisdom that realizes the sameness of all phenomena.

original: chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba /
analyzed: chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba /
translated: They were difficult to fathom because they had the profound nature of phenomena.

original: rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa /
translated: They had attained mastery over their own minds.

original: chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa /
translated: They had attained mastery over all phenomena.

original: las dang nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba /
analyzed: las dang nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba /
translated: They were liberated from all the obscurations of karma, afflictions, and views.

original: brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in teaching the realization of the support.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la zhugs pa /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la zhugs pa /
translated: They had entered the inexhaustible way of dependent origination.

original: lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba /
analyzed: lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba /
translated: They were free from all views, latent tendencies, and mental afflictions.

original: kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa /🔽las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa /
analyzed: kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa / las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa /
translated: They had abandoned all fetters.🔽They had abandoned all karma and afflictions.

original: las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in pacifying all karma and afflictions.

original: bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa /
analyzed: bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in the wisdom that realizes the truth.

original: chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mos pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mos pa /
translated: They constantly and continuously aspired to all phenomena being like echoes.

original: chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jigs pa med pa /
analyzed: chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jigs pa med pa /
translated: They were fearless in teaching the limitless way of the Dharma.

original: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in understanding things as they are.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa /
translated: They had the aspiration to arrange infinite buddha realms.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin @4b rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin @4b rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa /
translated: They were skilled in always being in the presence of the samādhi of remembering the buddhas who dwell in countless worlds.

original: sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in going to all the appearances of buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in making requests to the infinite buddhas.

original: sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in pacifying the kleśas that are created by the various views of beings.

original: ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in the wisdom that is the realization of the wisdom that is the play of accomplishing a hundred thousand samādhis.

original: yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste /
analyzed: yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste /
translated: They were all endowed with inexhaustible qualities that could be described for endless eons.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //

original: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di'ang ming tsam mo //

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di'ang ming tsam mo //

analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //

original: rnam par byang ba med pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba med pa ste /

analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang yang skye ba yang dag @60a *//
translated: A bodhisattva great being who practices in this way does not see the arising of any dharma, does not see the passing away of any dharma, does not see the defilement of any dharma, and does not see the purification of any dharma.

original: par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: tha snyad kyi rgyus mngon par zhen par gyur pas /

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'di ltar yongs @60b su rtog ste /

analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo //

translated: the five faculties, the five powers, the seven parts of awakening, and the eightfold noble path will appear in the world.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
translated: The four noble truths, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, all the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and all the dhāraṇī gateways will appear in the world.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four unhindered discernments, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha appear in the world.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: dge ba'i chos de dag la sogs pa mang po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos de dag la sogs pa mang po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: many such virtuous qualities appear in the world.

original: dge ba'i chos de dag 'jig rten du byung bas /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos de dag 'jig rten du byung bas /
translated: Because those virtuous qualities appear in the world,

original: rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dag yod pa yin /
analyzed: rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dag yod pa yin /
translated: the great and high-ranking kṣatriyas exist,

original: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dag yod pa yin /
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dag yod pa yin /
translated: the great and high-ranking brahmins exist,

original: khyim @66a *// bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba dag yod pa yin /
analyzed: khyim @66a *// bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba dag yod pa yin /
translated: the great and high-ranking householders exist,

original: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod pa yin /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod pa yin /
translated: and the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm exist,

original: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod pa yin /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod pa yin /
translated: the gods of the Thirty-three, the Yāma gods, the gods of Tuṣita, the gods who delight in creation, and the gods who control others’ creations.
